Courses.title: Guitar Fundamentals
Courses.description: Kickstart your guitar-playing journey by learning  strumming rhythms, and tuning your instrument for the perfect sound.

Courses.title: Drumming Techniques
Courses.description: Discover essential drumming techniques for beginners and start playing beats today.

Courses.title: Singing Mastery
Courses.description: Take your vocal skills to the next level with advanced singing techniques and exercises.

Courses.title: Advanced Music Theory
Courses.description: Deep dive into music theory, covering scales, modes, and harmony for advanced musicians.

Courses.title: Violin for Beginners
Courses.description: An introduction to playing the violin, covering posture, bowing, and basic music theory.

Courses.title: Piano Basics
Courses.description: Master the fundamentals of piano playing, from reading music to playing your first songs.
